Module FoundationsF25_2
Package guiUserUpdate

Class ViewUserUpdate

java.lang.Object
guiUserUpdate.ViewUserUpdate
public class ViewUserUpdate extends Object

Title: ViewUserUpdate Class.

Description: The Java/FX-based User Update Page. This page enables the user to update the attributes about the user held by the system. Currently, this page does not provide a mechanism to change the Username and not all of the functions on this page are implemented. Currently the following attributes can be updated: - First Name - Middle Name - Last Name - Preferred First Name - Email Address The page uses dialog boxes for updating these items.

Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter Â© 2025

Version:
1.01 2025-08-19 Initial version plus new internal documentation
Author:
Lynn Robert Carter

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewUserUpdate

      private ViewUserUpdate()

      Method: ViewUserUpdate()

      Description: This method initializes all the elements of the graphical user interface. This method determines the location, size, font, color, and change and event handlers for each GUI object.

      This is a singleton and is only performed once. Subsequent uses fill in the changeable fields using the displayUserUpdate method.

  • Method Details

    • displayUserUpdate

      public static void displayUserUpdate(javafx.stage.Stage ps, User user)

      Method: displayUserUpdate(Stage ps, User user)

      Description: This method is the single entry point from outside this package to cause the UserUpdate page to be displayed. It first sets up very shared attributes so we don't have to pass parameters. It then checks to see if the page has been setup. If not, it instantiates the class, initializes all the static aspects of the GUI widgets (e.g., location on the page, font, size, and any methods to be performed). After the instantiation, the code then populates the elements that change based on the user and the system's current state. It then sets the Scene onto the stage, and makes it visible to the user.

      Parameters:
      ps - specifies the JavaFX Stage to be used for this GUI and it's methods
      user - specifies the User whose roles will be updated

    • setupLabelUI

      private static void setupLabelUI(javafx.scene.control.Label l, String ff, double f, double w, javafx.geometry.Pos p, double x, double y)
      Private local method to initialize the standard fields for a label
      Parameters:
      l - The Label object to be initialized
      ff - The font to be used
      f - The size of the font to be used
      w - The width of the Button
      p - The alignment (e.g. left, centered, or right)
      x - The location from the left edge (x axis)
      y - The location from the top (y axis)
